title: 79/742/EEC: Commission Decision of 2 August 1979 refusing to accept the scientific character of the apparatus described as 'Coherent-CO2 Surgical Laser System 400'
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 2 August 1979  refusing to accept the scientific character of the apparatus described as "Coherent-CO2 Surgical Laser System 400"  (79/742/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Coherent-CO2 Surgical Laser System 400" is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
